title: Client starts repairing when i'm in loading screen
body: Right after Champ select i get into loading screen and it instantly closes and says error repairing files around 3500mbs. This resulted me in connecting late and pretty much lost me the ranked solo/duo game since i was already too behind. It has happened to me twice now and i still don't know why. Riot??

replies.body: So the same thing just happened to me and offered to send error report i accidentally didnt send it and now they remade and im lower priority queue with 20 minutes waiting time without the initial 5 mins or 10.But thats not the point this bug or whatever you want to call it cost me a ranked game and im plat 5 0lp .I feared i will lose and will be demoted to gold 1 but i just got the remade match in match history.**Help me please!**

Hey there,

That's odd that the game would close to boot you back to the patcher for a repair. In fact I dont think that's expected behaviour.

Especially if its happening so frequently, has this occurred since?
